info.title: User Product API
info.description: API for managing products associated with users

id.description: Server variable representing the region of the API (e.g., 'us' for United States, 'eu' for Europe)

get.description: Retrieve the contents of the cart for the user ID provided in the query parameter.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the subscription to retrieve products from

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose cart is being retrieved (query parameter)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID representing the session (header parameter)
